title: Isekai no Seikishi Monogatari (Tenchi Muyo! War on Geminar)
synopsis: Kenshi Masaki has been kidnapped and brought to the world of Geminar by a mysterious group. To get back home, he agrees to help them assassinate the newly crowned empress of the Shtrayu Empire, Lashara Aasu XXVIII, using a giant robot called a Sacred Mechanoid.
characters: ['Masaki, Kenshi', 'Shurifon, Aura', 'Aasu XXVIII, Lashara', 'Furan, Kyaia', 'Shume, Wahanly', 'Nanadan VII, Maria', 'Po Chiina, Lithia', 'Mea, Yukine', 'Doll', 'Furan, Mexiah']
voices: ['Shimono, Hiro', 'Noda, Junko', 'Yonezawa, Madoka', 'Kuwatani, Natsuko', 'Nakagawa, Rie', 'Saitou, Momoko', 'Oomura, Kana', 'Sonozaki, Mie', 'Gotou, Mai', 'Tsunematsu, Ayumi']
